Root Cause: Images lack alt attributes or have empty alt="
Fix 1: Add descriptive alt text to images

Root Cause: Insufficient contrast ratio between text and background
Fixed font sizes prevent scaling
Fix 1: Use relative units (rem/em) instead of px
Validation Step: Verify no horizontal scroll at 200% zoom

Root Cause: Form inputs lack associated labels or aria-label
Fix 1: Add explicit label elements for inputs
Fix 3: Implement form validation with accessible errors

Root Cause: Using semantic roles on wrong elements
Fix 1: Use semantic HTML before adding ARIA
Fix 2: Match ARIA roles to element purpose

Root Cause: Static aria-expanded value on dynamic content
Fix 2: Use JavaScript to manage state transitions
Validation Step: Verify screen reader announces state changes

Root Cause: Broken reference to description element
Fix 1: Ensure referenced ID exists in DOM

Symptom/Error: Missing live region for dynamic content
Root Cause: Dynamic updates not announced to screen readers
Fix 1: Add aria-live regions for status messages
Diagnostic Command: Check for aria-live or role attributes

Root Cause: Interactive elements missing keyboard support
Fix 1: Add tabindex and keyboard event handlers
Diagnostic Command: Test navigation using only Tab key
Validation Step: All interactive elements reachable via keyboard

Root Cause: Elements focused in wrong sequence
Fix 1: Restructure DOM to match visual order
Fix 2: Use tabindex to override default order

Root Cause: No visible indication of keyboard focus
Fix 2: Use outline or border for focus indication
Diagnostic Command: Tab through interface and observe focus
Validation Step: Focus is clearly visible on all elements

Root Cause: Cannot exit modal using keyboard
Fix 1: Implement focus trap with Escape key
Fix 2: Manage focus return to trigger element
Fix 3: Add close button as keyboard accessible
Validation Step: Can open and close modal using keyboard

Root Cause: H1-H6 hierarchy not maintained
Fix 2: Use only one H1 per page
Diagnostic Command: Use heading navigation in screen reader

Root Cause: Page lacks semantic navigation landmarks
Fix 1: Add nav role for navigation sections
Fix 2: Use main role for primary content
Diagnostic Command: Use landmark navigation in screen reader
Validation Step: Screen reader can navigate by landmarks

Root Cause: Data tables missing th elements or scope
Fix 1: Add th elements for table headers
Fix 2: Use scope attribute for complex tables

Root Cause: Links with vague text like 'click here'
Diagnostic Command: Read links list in screen reader
Validation Step: Link purpose clear from text alone

Root Cause: Text content rendered as images
Fix 2: Use CSS for text styling instead of images
Fix 3: Provide text alternative for essential images

Root Cause: Auto-playing animations cause dizziness
Validation Step: Animations reduced or removed for sensitive users

Root Cause: Horizontal scrolling required on narrow screens

Symptom/Error: Target size too small for touch
Root Cause: Interactive elements smaller than 44x44 pixels
Fix 2: Add padding to small interactive elements

Root Cause: Validation errors not linked to fields
Fix 3: Implement live regions for error announcements
Validation Step: Screen reader announces errors with fields

Root Cause: No programmatic indication of required fields
No feedback after form submission
Related form fields not grouped
Fix 1: Add fieldset and legend for grouped fields
Fix 3: Provide clear grouping for related inputs

Root Cause: Content changes without screen reader notification
No indication of loading progress
Fix 3: Use progressbar role for long operations

Root Cause: Route changes not announced
Fix 1: Update page title on route change
Fix 3: Announce route changes via live regions

Root Cause: New content loaded without notification
Validation Step: User aware when new content loads

Root Cause: Video content lacks text alternatives
Fix 1: Add closed captions for audio content
Fix 3: Use automatic captioning with manual review
Validation Step: All spoken content available as text

Root Cause: Visual information not described
Media plays automatically without user control
Fix 2: Provide user control for media playback
Fix 3: Add pause/play buttons that are accessible

Root Cause: No text alternative for audio content
Accessibility not tested in CI/CD
No screen reader or keyboard testing
Issues found after development complete
Features lack accessibility requirements
Fix 1: Add accessibility to definition of done

Root Cause: Complex gestures exclude users with disabilities
Validation Step: All functionality available via simple gestures

Root Cause: Content only works in one orientation
Interactive elements too small on mobile
Validation Step: All targets large enough for touch

Root Cause: Page breaks when zoomed on mobile
